definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Another currently popular team building exercise is Paintball.
sentences.chinese: 另一個當前受歡迎的建設團隊活動是彩彈射擊。

sentences.english: Be ready to shoot paintballs at any time.
sentences.chinese: 彩彈射擊準備在任何時候。

sentences.english: How Should I Take Care of Paintballs?
sentences.chinese: 我應該採取怎樣的彩彈關心？。

sentences.english: Advanced paintball players can fire with either hand.
sentences.chinese: 先進的彩彈玩家可以用左右手火。

sentences.english: In paintball, you should never miss a chance to be a hero.
sentences.chinese: 在彩彈遊戲中，你應該不要錯過任何成爲英雄的機會。
